scenario.name: send forwarding response back with diversion header
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 302 Moved Temporarily [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:user3;phone-context=national@[local_ip]> Diversion: <sip:amenhotep;phone-context=national@127.0.0.1>;reason=unconditional Content-Length: 0
